psychological_arc.arc_description: Maintained faith in cooperation despite betrayals

agent_000.story_summary: agent_000 participated in 5 social interactions. They tried cooperating 40.0% of the time, but were betrayed 2 times. Remarkably, they maintained high trust (0.73) despite setbacks.
key_insights: Experienced 2 betrayals but kept trying to cooperate
Maintained high trust despite negative experiences

agent_001.story_summary: agent_001 participated in 4 social interactions. They chose pure defection, scoring 7.0 points through strategic self-protection. These experiences made them more loss-averse (sensitivity: 1.52). Their trust in others diminished to 0.36.
key_insights: Adopted pure defection strategy for self-protection
Developed increased sensitivity to losses through experience
